title: Can I wipe over two sets of socks? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says if i performed and i wore two sets of socks when i want to wipe in the next wudu can i take one of them off or can i wipe on either one the answer is yes no problem if you wipe over the exterior one once you take it off you cannot wipe on the interior one and if you wipe on the interior one then put the exterior one back on again no problem in that when you want to wipe over you have to take off the exterior one and wipe over the one you have wiped on earlier and allano's best faizan from
